column1:
"In  any  event  to  exercise  revisionary  jurisdiction 
the  order

challenged  must  have 
occasioned  a 
failure  of justice  and  be

manifestly 
erroneous  which  go 
beyond  an 
error  or  defect  or

irregularity  that an  ordinary person  would instantly react to  it  -
the
order  complained of is  of such  a  nature  which  would have  shocked
